FuncDef:
The ipsec instance command creates an IPSec instance and enter the IPSec instance view.
The undo ipsec instance command restores the default setting.
By default, no IPSec instance is created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the IPSec instance.
The value is a decimal integer ranging from 1 to 128.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In dual-system hot backup scenarios, to create an IPsec instance, run the ipsec instance command.
Configuring the port number range, and remote backup profile in the IPsec instance view is recommended.
Precautions
IPsec supports only IPv4 services.
After an IPsec instance is applied to an IPsec policy, the IPsec instance cannot be modified or deleted.
